verses.verse: Ascribe <WH3051> to Yahweh, <WH3068> you sons of the mighty, <WH1121> ascribe <WH3051> to Yahweh <WH3068> glory <WH3519> and strength. <WH5797>
Ascribe <WH3051> to Yahweh <WH3068> the glory <WH3519> due to his name. <WH8034> Worship <WH7812> Yahweh <WH3068> in holy <WH6944> array. <WH1927>
Yahweh <WH3068>'s voice <WH6963> is on the waters. <WH4325> The God <WH410> of glory <WH3519> thunders, <WH7481> even Yahweh <WH3068> on many <WH7227> waters. <WH4325>
Yahweh <WH3068>'s voice <WH6963> is powerful. <WH3581> Yahweh <WH3068>'s voice <WH6963> is full of majesty. <WH1926>
The voice <WH6963> of Yahweh <WH3068> breaks <WH7665> the cedars. <WH730> Yes, <WH3068> Yahweh breaks <WH7665> in pieces the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon. <WH3844>
He makes them also to skip <WH7540> like a calf; <WH5695> Lebanon <WH3844> and Sirion <WH8303> like a young, <WH1121> wild ox. <WH7214>
Yahweh <WH3068>'s voice <WH6963> strikes <WH2672> with flashes <WH3852> of lightning. <WH784>
Yahweh <WH3068>'s voice <WH6963> shakes <WH2342> the wilderness. <WH4057> Yahweh <WH3068> shakes <WH2342> the wilderness <WH4057> of Kadesh. <WH6946>
Yahweh <WH3068>'s voice <WH6963> makes the deer <WH355> calve, <WH2342> and strips <WH2834> the forests <WH3295> bare. <WH1964> In his temple everything says, <WH559> "Glory! <WH3519>"
Yahweh <WH3068> sat <WH3427> enthroned at the Flood. <WH3999> Yes, <WH3068> Yahweh sits <WH3427> as King <WH4428> forever. <WH5769>
Yahweh <WH3068> will give <WH5414> strength <WH5797> to his people. <WH5971> Yahweh <WH3068> will bless <WH1288> his people <WH5971> with peace. <WH7965>
